name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Donald J. BLASIOLI, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Donald J. BLASIOLI, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 5th day of June, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED limited to whether DNA statistical evidence using the product rule was admissible at trial. This case is to be orally argued.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Timothy Paul Dawson, Adamsburg, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
693 A.2d 584
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Donald J. BLASIOLI, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 5, 1997.
Reconsideration Denied Aug. 8, 1997.
Timothy Paul Dawson, Adamsburg, for petitioner.
